    • findClientsAndDisconnect

      private void findClientsAndDisconnect(List<VirtualClient> disconnectedClients)
      Given a list of disconnected clients it finds all matches that contained them and disconnects all players in their same match, cleaning up the leftover state
      Parameters:
      disconnectedClients - The list of clients that have disconnected from the server

    • handleLoginReceived

      private void handleLoginReceived(LoginMessage login, VirtualClient client, HashMap<String,Object> userInfo)
      Handles the login event of a client
      Parameters:
      login - The login message from the Client
      client - The client that wants to log in
      userInfo - The data to send with the server notification used to tell game controllers that a login has happened
